HOUSE BILL/RESOLUTION HISTORY
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01526
ADOPTED AS RESOLUTION NO. HR00081
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING AND COMMENDING NIKKO BRYAN HUELGAS AND MARION KIM MANGROBANG FOR WINNING GOLD MEDALS IN THE INDIVIDUAL TRIATHLON EVENTS IN THE 29TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES (SEA GAMES) HELD IN KUALA LUMPUR, MALAYSIA ON AUGUST 19 TO 30, 2017, AND THEIR RESPECTIVE COACHES AND THE OFFICIALS OF THE TRIATHLON ASSOCIATION OF THE PHILIPPINES (TRAP) FOR THEIR ABLE MENTORSHIP AND SUPPORT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ANTONIO, MICHELLE M., ESTRELLA, CONRADO III M., DEL ROSARIO, MANUEL MONSOUR III T., VARGAS, ALFRED D., SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B., ABU, RANEO "RANIE" E., AGLIPAY-VILLAR, EMMELINE, VELASCO-CATERA, TRICIA NICOLE Q., UYBARRETA, CARLOS ROMAN, OLIVAREZ, ERIC L., NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C., SILVERIO, LORNA C., LOPEZ, MANUEL LUIS T., PACQUIAO, ROGELIO "RUEL" D., MANGAOANG, ALLEN JESSE C., ROA-PUNO, CHIQUI, DIMAPORO, MOHAMAD KHALID Q., MATUGAS, FRANCISCO JOSE II T., DE VENECIA, CHRISTOPHER V.P., CUEVA, LEO RAFAEL M., SIAO, FREDERICK W., BAGATSING, CRISTAL L., ORTEGA, PABLO, SAMBAR, MARK AERON H., GARCIA, GWENDOLYN F., ABELLANOSA, RODRIGO A., CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE", DALIPE, MANUEL JOSE "MANNIX" M., DEL MAR, RAUL V., PICHAY, PROSPERO JR.
